sources.title: Between Love and Hate | FULL MOVIE | Romance Crime Thriller
sources.description:
During summer vacation, an emotionally unstable 19-year-old boy falls in love with a married socialite twice his age (Susan Lucci, "All My Children"). When her husband finds out, the affair unravels, resulting in murder.

#romance #thriller #movie #tvmovie  #teenager #scandal #freemoviesonline #romantic #affairs

metadata.Plot: An older woman seduces a younger man and then breaks up with him. He becomes obsessive and refuses to accept the break up and subsequently turns violent.
metadata.Writer: D. Victor Hawkins, Tom Nelson, Rebecca Whittington
metadata.Actors: Susan Lucci, Patrick Van Horn, Raymond J. Barry
